<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ParseDirective returns true if there was an error or if the directive is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
